sentences.sContent: The plane crashed, killing all 200 people aboard.
sentences.sCn: 飞机失事，机上200人全部遇难。

sentences.sContent: The boat swayed as he stepped aboard.

synos.tran: [航]在飞机上；[军][船][交]在船上；在火车上

remMethod.val: a(在…) ＋ board(甲板) → 在甲板上 → 在船上

trans.tranOther: on or onto a ship, plane, or train
